Pricer WoW auctioning tool¶

(blank for now)

Installation¶

To install the pricer project, run this command in your terminal:

$ pip install pricer

Usage¶

Pricer uses a CLI interface, please see run.py for more information.

$ pricer [OPTIONS]
--version¶

Display the version and exit.

--help¶

Display a short usage message and exit.

pricer
